text: Claudio Ranieri (born 20 October 1951) is an Italian former football player and manager who is the current coach of Italian side Cagliari. Claudio Ranieri won the 2015–16 Premier League title with Leicester City. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:A.S. title: Claudio Ranieri
